objectives: Apply critical thinking to analyze healthcare access

multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of healthcare access

content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about healthcare access

main_activities.learning_style_adaptation: Use of diagrams, charts, and mind maps
